I feel like: last star wars movie i will ever see thank you george lucas for so many good films\,this one buried what little force remains\,i have lost hope in disney for yet another reason i will avoid future projects they purchased but didnt understand \,the movie was visually good and weak on many levels especially last of original characters being traded for ones i have no interest or desire to learn about\, disappointed the 40 years are over\,at least i can still watch star trek
